title: There’s A Holiday For Everyone
description: Kwanzaabot and Chanukah Zombie tell the story of the first Xmas in 2801 and the creation of Robot Santa.
quote: But on Santa’s very first delivery, something went tragically meshuggenah.
altHero: Robot Santa getting put together by a team of scientists
alt1: Kwanzaabot and Chanukah Zombie talking to some kids in the snow
alt2: The Friendly Robot Company building in the snow
alt3: Robot Santa shooting a huge gun with fire coming out the end
alt4: scientist with cracked glasses, a boxed gift flying through the air
